titleStmt.title: True relation of the great thunder, lightning, rain, great vvind, and prodigious hail, that happened at Alvanley in the parish of Frodham in Cheshire, on Sunday the 19th day of June, 1687 as it was sent to a merchant in London.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by D. Mallet, for G.P.,

notesStmt.note: "This may be Printed, R.P. July the 28th 1687."
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
